      • checkGuardians

        public ArrayList<Integer> checkGuardians(Player player)
        Checks the slots of guardians in param player's table. Can be used to guide attacks or repaint guardian icons.
        Parameters:
        player - Which player's table is checked.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of the guardian slots.
